name: Orchids Saigon Hotel
address: 192 Pasteur Street, Ward 6, District 3, Quận 3, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở TP. Hồ Chí Minh, cách Bảo tàng chứng tích chiến tranh 6 phút đi bộ, Orchids Saigon Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có trung tâm thể dục, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, khu vườn và phòng chờ chung. Ngoài nhà hàng, chỗ nghỉ còn có quầy bar và hồ bơi trong nhà. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại Orchids Saigon Hotel, các phòng đều có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có sân hiên phơi nắng.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần Orchids Saigon Hotel bao gồm Dinh Thống Nhất, Trung Tâm Thương Mại Diamond Plaza và Bảo tàng Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất, cách khách sạn 6 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Posizione centralissima a 5 min a piedi dalle attrazioni principali e 15 dal fiume con la zona carina per la sera. È anche a 5 min dallo Street Food Market ...favoloso!!!
Stanza moderna con ogni comfort. La nostra non grandissima ma ok per 2 notti.
Piscina al nono piano molto suggestiva e rilassante con vista particolare.
Purtroppo solo 4 lettini .... (lo spazio è ridottissimo).
Colazione non particolarmente adatta agli occidentali... ma tutto buonissimo!
Staff super disponibile e gentile
review.comment_negative: Magari qualcosa di più intercontinentale per la colazione! 😁

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Dobře vybavený a udržovaný hotel kousek od centra Saigonu. Do centra se dá dojít během chvilky i pěšky. Pokoje byly komfortní, postele pohodlné. Snídaně skvělé. V 9.patře se nachází hotelový bazén pro hosty, je dostatečně velký a člověk si v něm i dobře zaplave. U bazénu jsou lehátka a je od něj krásný výhled na město.

review.comment_positive: This was a beautiful hotel. The front desk was exceptionally helpful with all of our needs and always available to help. The rooms were beautifully designed and very clean. It’s in quiet location. The pool area was gorgeous and open concept with a steam room. Staying at Orchids Saigon Hotel  for one night is a luxury we thoroughly enjoyed.
review.comment_negative: We might have liked to stay in a slightly more lively location but  this was a great oasis from walking street area and it was close by.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Friendly and helpful staff. The room was comfortable with good facilities. Location very good and able to walk to most attractions. 
I would stay again regardless of the issues raised below.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast was limited for westerners. Bacon arrived only once during our 7 day stay. Chef provided eggs any way which was good. Could try some baked beans etc. Toaster basically not functional. 
If you stay at this hotel be prepared to walk and be careful. Motorbikes use the footpaths here as roads and the footpath in front of the hotel is no exception.
The hotel corridors are not air-conditioned and your room is not air conditioned once you leave your room. 
Also the hair dryer failed when we there and we were not offered a replacement.

review.rating: Muy mal servicio y habitaciones deficientes
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: La piscina está bien, un poco descuidada.
review.comment_negative:
La habitacion premium deluxe es pequeña, solo tienen en los pisos 2 y 3, ruidosa y en la mía no funcionaba correctamente el water. En el desayuno el agua sabe fatal y tras pedirles cambiarla la vuelven a meter en el mismo recipiente volviendo a saber mal.

Muy mal servicio, te exigen quedarse con el pasaporte y no te dejan irte hasta que comprueban que todo en la habitación está correcto. Si eres turista no te dan ninguna indicación que valga la pena sobre la ciudad, ademas intentamos que nos pidieran un taxi y nos dijeron que lo cogieranos nosotros con grab sin ninguna ayuda adicional.

Nada recomendable y encima caro para ser vietnam. ~55€/noche

review.comment_positive: room and bed
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately, booking.com rating are far from reality for this property, and here is why:
- Breakfast is very poor in this hotel, u can only see few dishes which is mostly dimsum some fried fish and pork sausage with limited selection of fried rice and noodles, and of course Pho. Other than that if u ask to cook fried egg chef lady which never smiles will accept your order by word "Roi" which is a very impolite way of answering. On top of that if u ask to cook 4 eggs they will only fry 2. I have stayed at a dozen of hotels with far worse ratings and all of them provided much better breakfast. 
- Another weird but big negative part is that hotel does not provide you with iron in the room and you cannot even bring it to some hotel rules. 
- And last but not least is the staff at first they are trying their best to accommodate your request and help you but unfortunately they do not have appropriate training all the time u will see them playing on phones sitting on the desk, i never see if they have any front desk manager or even supervisor and whenever i asked if they have they said no. 
- Another terrible experience u will face every time u stay in the hotel is car abundance in front of the hotel doors, i guess it might be the hotel owner or someone else but its all the time crowd of cars in front of the hotel doors, terrible experience to walk through them.

review.comment_positive:
Отличный отель, всем рекомендую!
Бронировали его в ночи, потому что апартаменты, которые мы сняли в другом месте, оказались ужасные. Бронь подтвердили в два часа ночи, мы приехали и нас сразу разместили. Номер дали на 11 этаже с видом на город. Номер совсем небольшой, но очень уютный и хороший! У нас были завтраки включены, на завтрак дают помимо стандартных блюд, ещё фо бо, курицу карри с рисом и лапшу)
Персонал очень отзывчивый, ремонт новый и хороший. Внизу кафешка с вкусным кофе. Отель находится во французском квартале, есть разные булочные с круассанами и багетами. Этот отель держит марку, поэтому крайне его рекомендую.

review.comment_negative: We encountered several issues with the hotel's handling of our early check-in request and subsequent room assignment. Despite our willingness to pay an additional fee, the hotel was unable to accommodate our request due to full occupancy. Upon arriving at the designated check-in time of 14:00, we were further inconvenienced when the hotel attempted to provide us with a room of lesser quality than the one we had reserved and paid for through Booking.com. Despite our objections and requests for clarification, the hotel staff insisted that the room was the same as the one we had booked. They also informed us that if we wanted to get the room from the photos, we would need to wait for an hour in the lobby so they could prepare it. No complimentary drinks were offered as an apology for the inconvenience caused. We found this to be a disrespectful and unprofessional way to treat guests.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Отличное расположение в центре города, до основных достопримечательностей пешая доступность, до других - недалеко на такси.
Чистые номера, очень доброжелательный персонал
review.comment_negative:
Невозможно шумный кондиционер (номер 501). так шумит, что ночью разбудил меня и я его полностью отключил. 
Завтраки неплохо было бы разнообразить европейской едой, небольшой ассортимент десертов. 
2 раза в бронированиях (делал 2 бронирования в связи с продлением проживания) указывал, что молодожены, но отель даже открытку не положил с приветствием. За период путешествия останавливались в 6 отелях во всем Вьетнаме и в этой части было больше внимания.

review.comment_positive: The hotel is wonderful, in an excellent location and the rooms are very clean and tasteful. We had a city view room (the view over Saigon is fantastic), and even though the room was on the front, I didn't notice any noise from the road. Staff was really professional and eager to help we anything we asked. Check-in was super smooth, and despite the fact we had only booked our room in the last minute the night before, everything was ready on time when we arrived.
review.comment_negative: The only minus was that in the first day when we arrived, pool water was so cloudy you couldn't see the bottom, so we didn't want to go in. But even that was resolved the next day and we could enjoy the pool and all the amenities!

review.comment_negative: none

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
- The staff were attentive, friendly and professional. 
- the room was nicely made up
- breakfast buffet had the standard exotic fruits which were lovely. 
- location was decent  - 15-20 min walk to the main walking street, about 8 mins to other attractions too.
- we had an early flight when we checked out and as our breakfast was included, the hotel made us a takeaway breakfast which was nice.
review.comment_negative:
- the breakfast options were limited to more Asian style rather than Western (which is expected of course). 
- our room was on floor 3 and was directly next to a little cafe/restaurant so our only view was that, and that place also had strong neon lights which came through the side of the curtains (I was directly next to the window and so this was in my face). Despite that, we couldn't hear outside so that was a bonus. 
- the pool was nice however was a little on the cold side

review.rating: Sauberes Hotel in zentraler Lage, Frühstück sehr enttäuschend
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
+ Lage: Hotel liegt zentral und fußläufig in max. 7 min vom Wiedervereinigungspalast, Notre Dame Kathedrale, Diamond Plaza, Schildkrötenbrunnen entfernt. Diverse Convenience Stores/ Restaurants/ Garküchen in der unmittelbaren Umgebung. Zum internationalen Flughafen sind es ca. 20min Fahrt mit dem Grab-/ Be-Taxi (bei Nicht-Rush-Hour-Zeiten wie z. B. 19 Uhr). 
+ Zimmer: sehr sauber, moderne Toilette mit Vollprogramm, Betten bequem, nicht hellhörig, mit Gepäckwaage!
+ Personal: sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, gutes Englisch 
+ Lobby: klimatisiert (ist nicht überall in Viet Nam selbstverständlich, auch bei höherwertigen Hotelklassen nicht selbstverständlich) 
+ Aufzug: gesichert durch Zimmerschlüssel, die nur zu den codierten Etagen fuhren
review.comment_negative:
- Frühstück: sehr wenig Auswahl, auch wenig Obstsorten, zu wenig Getränkeauswahl, Frühstücksraum zu klein und zu laut 
- Fitnessraum zu klein und dürftig eingerichtet
- Pool zu klein

review.comment_positive:

review.comment_negative: Nada

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The beds were large but probably a bit stiff for most people.
review.comment_negative:
Can only really say - trust the other negative reviews that say this place is an utter scam. They really try on the ‘dirty towel’ scam with every guest that attempts to check out; claiming a towel or sheets are dirty and demanding more money. Saw them harassing two families demanding money before they could check out. I seemingly checked out fine, ordered a Grab to the airport only for an attendant to run out and say I couldn’t leave until they checked and confirmed the.. towels.. of all things, weren’t dirty. Weird. We were fine but the manager was being quite rude to the families. Never seen this before in any hotel really.

Honestly, hotels like this are a dime a dozen in Ho Chi Minh, so better off not to go somewhere that won’t be waiting to hit you with ‘additional’ surprise costs at the end of your stay. Big recommendation to skip this one. 

Also, a bit off for the staff to take photos of your passport on their personal phone..

review.comment_negative: Breakfast seems to be lacking in flavour, however it is varied and it has several options to choose from. The staff at reception were great and helpful, however the staff working during breakfast seems to be annoyed and not happy to be there. It was also our honeymoon but there was not a small detail made in our room, not a big deal, but we visited Vietnam from North to South and the other 3 hotels were we booked made a small detail in our rooms. The design of the shower/bathub is flawed, and after a shower, the bathroom floor becomes a bit flooded, which is inconvenient.

review.comment_positive: Leaving this hotel.
review.comment_negative: Checked out one day early and staff told me I could get a refund for the unused night, but I needed to contact booking.com to facilitate refund, which I did. They even sent me an email confirming this. After 5 days and many calls, the hotel just changed their mind. Total waste of my time. Also went to the restaurant at 9.32pm to order a light snack, to be told kitchen at 9.30pm. Absolutely no customer service here. Happy to leave this hotel. Terrible experience.

review.comment_positive: near to restaurants
review.comment_negative: The staffs aren’t friendly and the service is not great. They didn’t have an iron in the room to iron your clothes, but has a laundry service. I called to get my clothes iron, but they never came. I called a few more times to follow up they just kept saying they are going to pick it up. after almost 2 hours, still no one came to pick it up. we had plans set up, but couldn’t leave the room because we had to wait. I finally called them to cancel and voice my frustration and the girl laugh and gave a fake sounding apology. I thought this was a 4-star hotel? It felt more of a 1-star hotel.

review.comment_positive: The room was spacious and comfortable. The location is close to the main tourist sights but not really near anything nice (next to a petrol station). It’s clean and everything is perfectly fine. The staff were perfectly pleasant. There’s nothing wrong with the hotel but we would chance a different hotel if we ever went back to Ho Chi Minh.
review.comment_negative: It has an impersonal, business hotel feel (which perhaps it is). The breakfast is mediocre and the dining room is windowless and feels like eating in an airport. Checkout felt a little accusatory - we weren’t allowed to leave (in our waiting taxi) until they had located the umbrella which we hadn’t taken from the room - with no apology after.

review.comment_positive:
Puhas, hea asukoht, teenindajad rääkisid inglise keelt. 
Ühistransport paljudesse suundadesse väga lähedal. Vanalinna 20 min kõndida, lennujaama bussi  või taksoga ~30 min sõita.
review.comment_negative:
Hommikusöögivalik normaalne, ootus oli kõrgem. Tundus, et töötajaid polnud piisavalt hommikusöögialas- need, kes teenindasid olid ülekoormatud, tehes kõike: toitu, koristasid, püüdsid täita tühjaks saanud vaagnaid ja klientide erisoove. Söögisaal väike ja rahvarohke. 
Basseini ala kitsas ja katuse all - natuke väsinud mulje, lisaks kõrval klaasseinaga konverentsiruum.

reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Well certainly, the bed and shower are the best part of the hotel and I would highly recommend it if u only want to come and sleep.
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately, booking.com rating are far from reality for this property, and here is why:
- Breakfast is very poor in this hotel, u can only see few dishes which is mostly dimsum some fried fish and pork sausage with limited selection of fried rice and noodles, and of course Pho. Other than that if u ask to cook fried egg chef lady which never smiles will accept your order by word "Roi" which is a very impolite way of answering. On top of that if u ask to cook 4 eggs they will only fry 2. I have stayed at a dozen of hotels with far worse ratings and all of them provided much better breakfast. 
- Another weird but big negative part is that hotel does not provide you with iron in the room and you cannot even bring it to some hotel rules. 
- And last but not least is the staff at first they are trying their best to accommodate your request and help you but unfortunately they do not have appropriate training all the time u will see them playing on phones sitting on the desk, i never see if they have any front desk manager or even supervisor and whenever i asked if they have they said no. 
- Another terrible experience u will face every time u stay in the hotel is car abundance in front of the hotel doors, i guess it might be the hotel owner or someone else but its all the time crowd of cars in front of the hotel doors, terrible experience to walk through them.

review.rating: phòng đẹp và thoải mái, nhân viên chu đáo
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm khách sạn ở ngay Trung tâm thành phố nên rất dễ di chuyển đến những địa điểm khác nhau ở Sài Gòn. Chỗ để xe rất rộng nên đỗ xe thoải mái. Phòng rộng rãi, thiết kế đơn giản nhưng thoải mái, sạch sẽ và tiện lợi. Nhân viên thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Bữa sáng phong phú, đa dạng, được nấu nướng rất đầu tư và kỹ lưỡng. Nước cam ép uống ngon, tươi. Mình làm review trên TripAdvisor và nhận được một bánh croissant. Khách có thể trả phòng trễ đến 6g tối, phí bằng nửa giá phòng lúc đặt phòng. Sau 6g sẽ là 100% giá phòng. Do mình có chuyến bay tối nên cũng khá tiện.
review.comment_negative:
Phòng cách âm không tốt lắm, dù đã đóng cửa nhưng vẫn nghe người bên ngoài nói chuyện.
Nhân viên dọn phòng trễ, trong khi các khách sạn khác đều dọn phòng sáng sớm, nhân viên Orchids lại dọn phòng khoảng tầm 11-12 giờ, nếu mình chỉ book 1 ngày thôi thì chắc đã không được dọn phòng rồi.
Nhân viên nhà hàng cứ nói tiếng Anh với mình, dù mình đã trả lời bằng tiếng Việt?!

review.rating: An oasis in the centre of HCMC!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The room was excellent. Clean, cool, and comfortable. If you're looking for some peace in the bustle of the city this is it. 

We loved the elevated swimming pool but it was a shame the bar wasn't open there. It could be so much nicer up there if they offered drinks, had some more plants and just made it feel more welcoming. I know it's a 'corporate hotel' but everyone likes a cool beer under some greenery!
review.comment_negative:
These are very minor negatives! 

The breakfast is, despite some of the reviews, focussed on Vietnamese cuisine. I have no problem with this but a more continental offering would have been nice. 

There is a 'beer' garden which is actually just some chairs in the lobby. You can have food and drinks there but we didn't as it really feels like you're just sat in the lobby waiting for a taxi or something.

review.comment_positive: Excellent facility in a ultra-convenient location. The hotel also has a small gym and pool to cool down in the hot weather of Saigon. The room is in modern condition, clean and came with a beautiful restroom I had scheduled visits to the Eye Hospital nearby so this hotel made the perfect option for doctor visits and surgery. However it would be ideal for all tourist and travel workers alike. I can easily access the popular part of the city with a quick walk or taxi ride.
review.comment_negative: Staff was not all friendly (some were and some weren't). I had previously stayed at another hotel in Hanoi where I received a difference experience of friendly staff (with a doorman, smiley faces whenever I see them and they always make conversations with myself and my friend to make sure we had all we need and more) so the variance was rather clear. However, Orchids Hotel Staff were quick with all requests and also happy to let me check out 1 hour later than normal.

review.rating: Un confort remarquable avec la qualité de service irréprochable!

review.comment_positive: The room was spacious and comfortable. The pool was lovely too.
review.comment_negative:
I didn't appreciate some of the policies of the hotel: 1. There is no iron in the room and they won't bring it. I called and they told me that they offer it only as a service. 2. I requested a (paid) early check-in and they informed me that it depends on their availability. When they arrived, the receptionist didn't even look at the computer and told me that I would have to come back 3h later to check in even though I had just arrived after a 20h flight. 3. Then, I asked to get breakfast and the receptionist told me that it was already 9.15 and that breakfast is served until 9.30. So, I couldn't even get a cup of tea and a pastry. 

It's a good hotel but I'll go somewhere else next time.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Le camere sono grandi, comode e perfettamente pulite: la nostra era molto silenziosa e aveva
 un bel bagno con water elettronico. A colazione c'era tanta scelta per tutti i gusti e ottima frutta fresca. Il personale è veramente di altissimo livello: dei ragazzi gentilissimi e iper disponibili che parlano un ottimo inglese e sono sempre pronti ad aiutarti per qualsiasi cosa. Infine la posizione dell'hotel è ottima a 15/20 minuti a piedi dal quartiere coloniale e dalle zone di maggiore interesse. Per me, è difficile avere di meglio.

review.comment_positive:
Professionelles Hotel, auch und eher für Business. Tolle Suiten mit Super-Aussicht, modern und komfortabel. Den Pool durften wir auch nach Check-Out nutzen, das tat vor der Abreise so richtig gut.
Das Frühstück war in Ordnung, eher wenig westlich - aber die Nudelsuppe war wie überall prima - und zusammen mit dem Yoghurt mit Maracujas dann absolut für uns ausreichend.
review.comment_negative:
Pool macht bereits um 18 Uhr dicht.
Die Mitarbeiter waren freundlich, aber nicht so herzlich wie wir es an vielen Orten erlebt haben - eher professionell souverän.
Das Frühstück am Samstag war recht hektisch, das Personal war fast überfordert, v.a. die Dame an Suppe und Omelette hatte  null Unterstützung...

review.comment_positive: Fantastic room! Very comfortable beds, amazing hotel facilities, very clean, really good breakfast and really good value for money compared to other hotels we stayed in HCMC. Highly recommended. The 10-minute walk to the busy areas may put some people off, but in our opinion, it's well worthy for a cleaner and quieter stay. Highly recommended and would choose this hotel again.

review.comment_negative: Given a superior room when we booked a deluxe!   Room was clean but very cramped. Aircon not strong enough. Bed very uncomfortable.  NO restaurant despite saying so (at least not for dinner) so first night we ordered room service from a very limited menu (made more limited by items on the menu not being available), waiting nearly an hour to get it and it was cold and tasteless. $30+ for a basic hamburger!!  Oh yes - - the compendium contained a full inventory of all items in the room, from the bed down to the slippers, with a "compensation" price against each . . in case we decided to steal, break or lose an item, I suppose.  Not very hospitable

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: It is in a great location near most of the museums, tourist attractions, and parks. There are great breakfast and coffee places near the park few blocks away, but not much good restaurants nearby. The hotel is newish and clean. It is in a quiet area at night. We skipped the hotel breakfast as there are tons of brunch places all over Saigon. Housekeeping are efficient keeping the rooms clean.
review.comment_negative: I requested for extra pillows and they didn't arrive. Guests pay for lost key cards. Poor soundproof. We could clearly hear the other guests in the room and in the hallways. Doors make this loud noise when you close them and with the poor soundproofing, it can be a lot to hear doors closing and opening from other rooms. The pool is terrible. It is small with a tiny lounging areas and it was busy.

We had a fantastic stay at Orchids - we only stayed two nights so can't comment on all the facilities on offer but we had zero complaints about our room and breakfast. The room was clean, comfortable and spacious and the breakfast was varied and delicious.

The staff were extremely helpful and the location was exactly what we needed for our short itinerary with a short walk to Ben Tanh Market and other sites. Overall, great value for money!

review.rating: AVOIS THIS HOTEL AT ALL COSTS !!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
great location, we walked all
round the city from the hotel,
Modern bathroom, Although this flooded the floor with every shower, badly designed and we had to use towels to mop up excess water to avoid slipping
review.comment_negative:
when we were checking out, we were charged 250,000 Vietnamese Dong each for 2 towels that they said were dirty !! They even had photos of said towels !! The marks were from foundation which I owned up too but they said the charge was because they couldn’t get them clean. I was absolutely flabbergasted, I have never in all my years of travelling & staying in hotels around the world been charged for towels, I asked for the towels that I was being charged for (their flimsy quality of these very small barh towels were definitely not worth 250,000 each!!) 
The staff then changed their tune and said the charge was for specialist cleaning ….. again there is no way it would have cost this much as I used to live in Saigon & know the cost of living !!
Essentially this hotel is a total rip off / they were trying all ways to extract money out of us & if I hadn’t been heading to the airport for a flight I would have ask speak to the manager. The reception staff were extremely rude did not bat an eyelid at this shocking charges & I assume this is an expectation passed down from management. 
Having read other reviews there are other guests with similar experiences & extra charges being demanded !
AVOID THIS HOTEL AT ALL COSTS !!!

review.rating: Good Hotel, but ridiculous checkout policies ruin the experience
review.room_type: Phòng Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Với Bể Jacuzzi Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: friendly staff and good location. Rooms are clean and in a good condition
review.comment_negative:
unfortunately, the checkout policy is ridiculous. We had a suit in the hotel and upon checkout we were presented with a towel and a pillow sheet which good a bit dirty. The hotel staff made a big fuzz about this minor issue and demanded we compensate the hotel for the damage. Initially, they asked for 900.000 Dong which is half the roommate per night almost. So absolute ridiculous pricing which I have never experienced before. We explained them that the stains can be removed by washing as we have the same stains caused by the hair color at home but never have any issues. This checkout policy has ruined the entire hotel experience. Additionally, the pricing which was asked for seems like a cheap way to get additional money and to replace older towels or sheets on the expense of the customer. We refused to pay after a discussion of 20min. I have never ever experienced something like this before.
As other hotels in the city have a similar value offering but do not have such ridiculous policies I would recommend staying elsewhere

review.rating: we are glad and lucky to stay in this hotel.

review.comment_positive:
the staff is very friendly and helpful.the boy helped us since we just got off the taxi. feel very welcomed. after check out in the morning, we stored the luggage there and went for sightseeing for whole day, as our flight was at night. the hotel even offered us to use the gym to have a shower before heading to the airport. 
The location is great, it was easy to go to all attractions . Good restaurants are nearby.
will stay there again if we will go to Ho Chi Minh in the future.
review.comment_negative: nothing.

review.rating: Great stay for a week or more in Ho Chi Minh City.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Orchids Saigon is a fabulous hotel located in a very good place. You can find a number of dining options around such as Jollibee, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf and other restaurants. It's quite close to places like War Remnants Museum, Ho Chi Minh City Museum (walking distance) and just 10 minutes' drive to famous Golden Water Puppet Show Theater. This is a luxurious hotel with wonderful staff service. Breakfast was superb with a varieties of options to choose from. Even if you do not eat pork then they would arrange complimentary vegetable rice for you which was much appreciated. Room was excellent with so many spaces (i.e. drawers) to keep your belongings. Bathroom was quite cozy, comfortable with a high-tech toilet. They do have a decent swimming pool which is spacious enough to swim and relax. We would love to stay again in future.
review.comment_negative: Nothing particular, however, their breakfast finishing time seemed a bit earlier than usual (most probably 6:30 am to 9:30 am) which could be extended till 10 am. In addition, it's better to have glass doors in the shower because their curtain system isn't good enough to keep sprinkles of water from making the bathroom floor a bit wet.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: La habitación estaba bastante bien y limpia.
review.comment_negative:
El trato que recibimos del personal. Dejaba bastante que desear, nos sentimos tratados con un poco de desprecio. Llegamos tarde al hotel debido a que nuestro vuelo se retraso y al pedirles ayuda para buscar algo donde cenar basicamente nos dijeron que nos buscaramos la vida.

El desayuno buffet con muy poca variación de comida. Al hacer el check out nos dijeron que nos esperaríamos ya que no se fiaban de como habíamos dejado la habitación ni tampoco de si no habíamos cogido nada del mini bar tal y como les dijimos.

review.rating: relax in the heart of the city

review.rating: Hôtel très bien situé à la prestation impeccable.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
L'Hôtel ORCHIDS de SAIGON est un établissement haut de gamme avec tous les services associés et très bien situé dans le district 1.
La chambre était très propre et bien insonorisé. Elle bénéficiait d'une vue très "new-yorkaise" sur le boulevard PASTEUR.
La literie est très confortable.
Petit déjeuner varié et très complet.
Je recommande !
review.comment_negative: Le service rendu est parfait mais seul bémol, il est totalement standardisé. Vous pourriez être dans n'importe quel endroit sur la planète.

review.rating: Modernes, sauberes Hotel in zentraler Lage, Frühstück sehr enttäuschend
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
+ Lage: Hotel liegt zentral und fußläufig in max. 7 min von der Notre Dame Kathedrale, Diamond Plaza, Schildkrötenbrunnen entfernt. Diverse Convenience Stores/ Restaurants/ Garküchen in der unmittelbaren Umgebung. Zum internationalen Flughafen sind es ca. 20min Fahrt mit dem Grab-/ Be-Taxi (bei Nicht-Rush-Hour-Zeiten wie z. B. 19 Uhr). 
+ Zimmer: sehr sauber, Betten bequem, nicht hellhörig, mit Gepäckwaage!
+ Personal: sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, gutes Englisch
+ Lobby: klimatisiert (ist nicht überall in Viet Nam selbstverständlich, auch bei höherwertigen Hotelklassen nicht selbstverständlich)
review.comment_negative:
- Frühstück: sehr wenig Auswahl, auch wenig Obstsorten (wir haben zum 3. Mal hier übernachtet und sind sehr enttäuscht), Frühstücksraum zu klein und zu laut
- Zimmerservice: Wir haben die Bettwäsche am Vorabend reklamiert (hatte Löcher), und es sollte neue Bettwäsche am nächsten Vormittag getauscht werden. Es wurde erst am nächsten Abend gewechselt, nachdem wir erneut bei der Rezeption reklamieren mussten.

review.rating: 朝食がおいしくて、コストパフォーマンスが良いです
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: スタッフは全員とてもフレンドリーでした。カタコトですが日本語を話すスタッフもいました。朝食がとても良かったです。ヌードル・ステーションで毎日３～４種類の麺、ビーフかチキンのスープ、具もビーフ・チキン・チャーシューと選べて、5泊しましたが飽きることがありませんでした。ヌードルステーションに置いてある、スダチのような柑橘類の実をサラダにぎゅっとしぼって食べる我流のサラダが気に入って毎日食べていました。8階にあるプールサイドも風が抜けて気持ち良く日中ダラダラするのにおすすめです。
review.comment_negative: 中心部からは徒歩で15分程度です。立地は抜群に良い、というわけではありませんが、毎朝通勤時に駅まで歩く距離と同じぐらいなので、私は苦になりませんでした。ただ、このホテルとは関係ないのですが、ホーチミンではGRABの使い勝手が他国ほど良くないので、タクシーではないと移動できない人には、いちいちフロントでタクシーを呼んでもらう手間がかかると思います。バス停へは徒歩2分ぐらいでした。

review.comment_negative:
The pool was freezing, didn’t see anyone use it for the 5 days we were there, now we know why.  
The laundry service was ridiculously expensive compared the prices in north and central Vietnam.  We didn’t use it.
There was a conference on at the hotel so there were a lot of non residents.  They used the area next to the pool which made it weird to use the pool for us and them.  There was a rip in the sheets but they fixed it and gave us complimentary fruit.  Staff walked into our room without knocking.  Very rude as my partner was not fully dressed when they walked in

review.comment_positive: Todo estuvo perfecto! La habitación muy cómoda y siempre limpia. El desayuno fue espectacular y la atención de todo el personal del hotel no puede ser mejor, todos siempre están dispuestos a ayudar.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff was extremely courteous. Hotel was clean and so was the room. The breakfast spread was GOOD.
review.comment_negative:
Since I am lactose  intolerant, I had requested Orchids to arrange some alternative like soya milk or oats milk. This was not done for some reason initially. Thereafter the restaurant manager went out of his way to arrange it. But the question is, SURELY, a hotel of the Orchids chain can store some small number of 200 ml tetra packs of these alternatives, so that lactose intolerant guests have some alternative. Otherwise, the breakfast spread was first rate.

Additionally, the tea tray in the room had no creamer (my wife is NOT lactose intolerant) - when asked, they said they don't keep it. Oh c'mon, these are small things that are available in every other hotel.

今後booking.comのホテル選びはやめようと思う

review.rating: Great value for money. Best location. Amazing breakfast. Extraordinary staff. 100% recommended.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Do I recommend staying in this hotel? Absolutely Yes
- Location: It is located in the heart of the city. Main attractions/historical sites (cathedral, post office, sky deck observatory, etc.) within walking distance from the hotel. There are different restaurants in the area, bars, ATM's, etc. 
- Room: The room was spacious, well equipped (coffee, tea, toiletries, etc.), clean, has a big bathroom, enough storage and comfortable beds. It was bigger than I expected. 
- Facilities/breakfast/hotel: The premises are well maintained, there is a pool where you can refresh and spend some time. The breakfast is amazing, they offer different options (omelets, fruit, yogurt, pastries, local dishes, vegan options, etc.) The food is fresh and tasty
- Staff: The staff was amazing, very friendly and polite. They welcomed us with a delicious cold tea. The staff from the breakfast is very service oriented. They made our staying very pleasant. Check in/out very smooth.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Die Zimmer waren sauber, das Bett bequem und wir konnten unser Gepäck während weiterer Reise im Hotel zwischenlagern.
review.comment_negative: Wir wussten leider nicht, welches Zeichen/Knopf wir bedienen mussten, damit das Zimmer gereinigt wird (wahrscheinlich Knopf neben dem Bett). Ein Hinweis wäre gut gewesen.

review.comment_positive:
The location of the hotel is good and nearby most of the tourist attractions of Saigon. The staff is courteous but can improve on their communication skills by having more people coversant in English. The breakfast menu was decent but for Indians who like chicken and prefer veggies, it was a bit disappointing. We had to get cup noodles to the room and eat them but then their is a decent Fried Chicken place akin to KFC hardly 200m from the property. So overall a much recommended place to stay for tourists esp from India
 Thank you

review.rating: Good location, comfortable hotel. Look out for extra charges

review.comment_positive: I loved the location. it was very close to all the big attractions, but a cleaner area than district 1. The beds were comfortable and the bidet was full electric seat
review.comment_negative: The pillows were so flat. The breakfast food was lukewarm. The pool closed way too early - 6pm. The staff were very friendly. The only complaint was when we were checking out they tried to say we stained a towel and wanted to charge us for it. both my sister and I were very careful with the towels as we had heard about this. I asked to see, they showed me a photo, but it looked like a wet towel, not stained. I felt upset that I was accused of something I didn’t do. it left a bitter taste in an otherwise good stay

review.rating: Good value, great location, modern, clean and comfortable
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel was in a great location. It was very clean and comfortable with a good range of breakfast options. The rooms were modern and tasteful with dressing gowns and slippers provide plus great Air Con and a safe in the room.
review.comment_negative: We had a late flight and asked if there was a courtesy room available to shower etc. This was not something offered so we requested a late checkout, offering to pay whatever the cost, expecting a percentage charge. We were told this was not possible as the hotel was fully booked. We then checked online to find another room elsewhere and found multiple rooms were available to book at this hotel. When we showed the staff that we had found availability, they seemed indifferent and told us to book online, using the app. We had checked out of our original room, then had to wait 2hrs to check into the next room. Not the best customer service experience, which was a shame as everything else was really great!

we had a lovely & spoiled end of our 4-week Vietnam trip by staying in this hotel

review.rating: Tolles Hotel in sehr guter Lage
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel liegt am Rand vom Bezirk 1, gehört aber zum Bezirk 3. Dennoch ist man in 10 Gehminuten im Zentrum und an den wichtigsten Sehenswürdigkeiten. Das Personal war sehr bemüht, hilfsbereit und immer zuvorkommend. Das Frühstück in Buffetform war sehr vielseitig ( Brot/ Brötchen/Käse - Schinken-Aufschnitt/ vietnamesische Suppen/ warme Gerichte sowie frisch von Koch zubereitete Eierspeisen). Diverse Kaffeesorten rundeten das Frühstücksangebot ab. Es gab sogar zur Frühstückszeit eine Eiscreme - Maschine mit zwei verschiedenen Eissorten. Das I- Tüpfelchen des Hotels ist der Pool,den man bis 18 Uhr bequem nutzen kann. Wir waren begeistert von der Möglichkeit, vor der Abreise nochmal Duschen und uns umziehen zu können.  Da unser Flug am Abend erst war und wir das Zimmer wegen starker Belegung nicht länger behalten konnten, wurde uns dieser Service angeboten. Man hatte zu jeder Zeit das Gefühl, ein willkommener Gast zu sein.

review.rating: Not the room I paid for
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The location is pretty decent with plenty of food options within walking distance. The bar staff are a hoot and are quite generous with measures. The room was always spotless after the cleaners had been and the laundry service is top notch.
review.comment_negative: I paid for a city view room and I got a 2nd floor room with views of some guy's crack when I opened the curtains... I brought this up to the receptionist and he said "But madam, you have a view of the back of the hotel sign" before realising I wasn't impressed and admitting that the room I had paid for wasn't available. I would have expected a small refund for the difference or a voucher for the bar or something. The "soundproofing" between rooms isn't amazing. Let's just say I had to listen to the sounds of a lady caller providing services to another guest and just leave it at that.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Hotel is located in a great area next to Turtle Lake. The "gym" consists of two machines which clearly was a guest room before. Next to the pool there is a conference room where conferences take place while others are splashing away in the pool.
review.comment_negative: Either the management just thinks that quite a few of the guests are thieves or it is true. In any case, it is quite embarrassing when the staff tells you to "take a seat until we checked the room" implying you are a crook stealing their precious hotel towels or whatever other very valuable items they deem in their rooms (I at least cannot remember a single one). I simply left anyhow. The clerk seemed shocked but had to accept it. That is why I will not book this hotel again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Hotel was perfect! Location is amazing, 20 mins from airport and right in the city center, it was easy to navigate from there. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Rooms are nicely decorated, and quiet, there was very minimum noise from the streets, also rooms were perfectly cleaned every day. Lots of small toiletteries in the bathroom. Breakfast was good, you can order more food directly from the kitchen window, don't stick to what is already in the hot bowls. I would stay here again.
review.comment_negative: Pool is not heated, so the water was cold for us. But still, we enjoyed it. Bed was more on the harder side and pillows were too solf (maybe I'm just picky, it wss okay for my wife). And in the mornings you hear the staff walkie-talkie screaming behind the door, they could for sure lower the volume.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
La propreté de la chambre,  et la gentillesse du personnel.
Le calme de la rue et l'insonorisation de la chambre .

C'est une rue avec des bureaux, donc calme (si vous voulez vous promener et faire des boutiques à pieds ce n' est pas le bon endroit)  mais vous êtes au calme et l hôtel est  proche du centre ville et de 2 grands centre commerciaux (5 min en voiture) et des artères plus vivantes. 
Nous avons eut une chambre au 14e PH pour 3 nuits. La robinetterie la salle de bain  étaient nickel. 
Les lits confortables. 
Vous accédez aux étages avec une carte personnel ce qui évite que des étrangers qui n'ont pas leur chambre à votre étage y aillent. 
Personnel très agréables, petit déjeuner asiatique et européen  varié (plusieurs plats changent tous les jours) correct. 
Nous y reviendrons.

review.comment_positive: La estética del hotel es buena. Las habitaciones son amplias y bonitas.Está bien ubicado.
review.comment_negative:
La atención al cliente ha dejado mucho que desear.
Todas las facilidades que nos han brindado el resto de hoteles de Vietnam (a veces de menos categoría) aquí han sido problemas. 
En primer lugar, me puse en contacto con ellos para gestionar el traslado desde el aeropuerto que es un servicio que ofertan y me invitaron a usar la aplicación Grab y coger un taxi. Lo tuve que gestionar yo.
En segundo lugar, solicité hacer un check out más tarde (pagando obviamente) ya que teníamos un vuelo internacional y queríamos estar descansados. Me contestaron que era imposible porque el hotel estaba lleno. Inmediatamente, a través de Booking reservé una habitación sin problemas (cuando se supone que estaba lleno) pagando el precio completo cuando no voy a disfrutar ni de la noche ni del desayuno incluido. En los otros hoteles nos ofertaron este servicio pagando un 20% a modo simbólico.
En cuanto a servicios, el desayuno nos ha parecido muy pobre para el gusto occidental. Yo no desayuno ni arroz, ni pollo, ni cerdo, ni noodles.....curioso que en el hall haya una pequeña cafetería donde sí hay algo de bollería con croissant a casi 2 euros. 
Y respecto a la  piscina,  una decepción que cierre a las 6. Con este calor la gente está deseando llegar de la calle y darse un chapuzón. En el resto de hoteles estaba abierta hasta las 9 o 10 de la noche.
La verdad es que esperaba mucho más de este hotel. Las fotos muy bonitas pero para mí no es un 4 estrellas.

review.comment_positive:
Très belle chambre avec une belle vue sur Saigon (chambre au 12 ème étage), bien isolée du bruit, personnel très agréable parlant anglais, hôtel très bien placé à 10 min à pieds des principaux lieux d'intérêts et 20 min à pieds de la rivière. Il y a également une piscine (que nous n'avons pas testé). 
Petit déjeuner inclus (principalement de très bon plats Vietnamiens ) ! 
Très belle surprise pour nos premières nuits au Vietnam !
review.comment_negative: Honnêtement, rien...

the room was so comfortable and so spacious. well designed. we were upgraded

review.comment_positive: Location
review.comment_negative:
The check in was a bit troublesome due to some misunderstanding / miscommunication, they cannot accomodate our request due to “full” capacity. We booked a Suite Double and Premium Deluxe Twin rooms.  

Since there is no Double bed in the Suite Double only Twin beds, they upgrade us to a suite room on the highest floor. The room was big and with a Jacuzzi tub.

The Premium Twin room was still dirty when they handed it to us after an hour past the check in time. 

Both rooms does not come with a flat iron and ironing board which is very common with hotels. 

The breakfast was almost the same everyday except.

The room is not sound proof cause we can hear the people in the next room beside us.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Ein wirklich sehr schönes Hotel gut gelegen. Wir hatten ein Zimmer im obersten Stockwerk mit einen schönen Blick auf die City. Trotz der zentralen Lage ist es in den Zimmer ruhig. Bei Frühstück fehlt es ebenfalls an nichts und das Personal war stets freundlich und darum bemüht uns einen schönen Aufenthalt zu ermöglichen. Wir würden das Hotel wieder buchen.

review.rating: Erneut ein toller Urlaub im Orchids
review.room_type: Suite Orchids Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Wie schon während unseres ersten Aufenthalts im Vorjahr hatten wir die Familien-Suite im 12. Stock, welche wirklich viel Platz bietet, nebst dem Bad mit Dusche über eine Jacuzzi-Wanne sowie ein separates WC verfügt, was öfter mal nützlich ist. Der Vorraum mit Sofa und Liegestuhl lädt zum Verweilen ein, gerade wenn mal wieder die Mittags-Sonne brennt.
Täglich werden die Zimmer top gereinigt, Betten gemacht und die täglichen 3 kostenlosen Wasserflaschen erneuert.
Der Raum verfügt über 2 separat einstellbare Klimaanlagen.
Über die die beiden TV-Geräte kann auch auf YouTube und Netflix zugegriffen werden.
Der Pool-Bereich im 9. Stock bietet etwas mehr Platz als bei anderen Hotels der Preisklasse, das Wasser ist tatsächlich eine Abkühlung, zumal er aber draussen/überdacht ist, bietet er die beste Gelegenheit sich an das Klima zu gewöhnen. Zudem ist eine kleine Dampfsauna vorhanden.
Schliesslich noch das Positive zum Frühstück: frisches Phô, frische Eier/Omeletts sowie der vietnamesische Eiskaffee! Letzterer will jedoch bestellt werden, also Hände weg von der Kaffee-Kanne!    :)
review.comment_negative:
Achtsamer Umgang - wie natürlich auch in allen andern Hotels im heissen Asien - ist mit den Klimaanlagen empfohlen. Unsere Empfehlung zur Vermeidung von Erkältungen: nur max. 11 Grad Unterschied zur Aussentemperatur einstellen, kein schwenkendes/direktes Gebläse auf die Stelle wo geschlafen wird, sondern nur indirekt kühlen lassen.
Weniger Einfluss hat man auf die Temperaturen in den allgemein zugänglichen Bereichen (Lobby, Aufzüge, Frühstücksraum). Gerade beim Frühstück trugen wir jeweils Hoodies um uns vor den zu kühl eingestellten Anlagen zu schützen. 
Um beim Frühstück zu bleiben: reichhaltiges Angebot für alle die gerne als warme Mahlzeit oder Phõ-Suppe frühstücken. Wer es hingegen Continental bevorzugt (Brötchen, Marmeladen, Käse, Müsli...) wird auf eine vergleichsweise kleine Auswahl stossen.

review.rating: For the price I would look elsewhere. Charging 1.6mil ($65) is ridiculous for the facilities provided. Look elsewhere.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Nice view from the room. Large, comfortable bed
review.comment_negative:
The pool shares its floor with the banquet center. Nothing like relaxing on 1 of 6 tightly-packed deck chairs while a DJ tries to pump up a Saturday morning business lunch. Pool itself was freezing, small, and a flat 1.4 meters. 

The shower was my main problem with the room. It is a bathtub with a very cheap shower head. The curtain was extremely thin and did not cover the length, resulting in a lot of water in the slippery floor. The combo of high walled tub and being raised made exiting and exiting very dangerous. I did slip on entry and almost fell. I would not be surprised if many older guests are intimidated by the shower. 

The breakfast buffet was bland and did not have many western choices. No Orange juice or coffee station-just a gas station type pot of black coffee with only sweetened condensed milk as a choice for cream. I was served an omelette made with old eggs. When I told the staff they shrugged and asked if I wanted it cooked more and did not offer a new omelette.

review.rating: Sehr angenehmes und schönes Hotel in super Lage
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Super Lage mitten im 1. Bezirk.
Zimmer sehr groß und schön und vorallem ruhig! Die Fenster dichten den Straß3nlärm sehr gut ab! Auch bereits im 3. Stock. Bett sehr angenehm u wie in Asien üblich auf der harten Seite.
Pool sehr erfrischend mit Blick über die Dächer.
Frühstück sehr gut (aber erwarten Sie kein Kontinentales Frühstück).
review.comment_negative:
Frühstück ist zwar sehr gut. Auf Wurst und Käse hatte ich mich nach 3 Wochen wohl zu früh gefreut, nicht mit europäischem Standard vergleichbar. Da bleibt man dann lieber bei der asiatischen Variante, diese war sehr gut inkl. frischen Eier und Früchten.
Kaffee leider sehr dünn zubereitet. Kein echter vietnamesischer Genuss.
Der Pool ist überschaubar und nicht geheizt. Es gibt dort leider nur 4-5 Liegen.
Der Wasserschlauch der Dusche in unserem Zimmer wurde mit Klebeband "repariert" und das Wasser hat sich daher leider im gesamten Bad verteilt. Keine 4* Lösung ;)

review.rating: Trop cher pour des prestations décevantes
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
L’emplacement est bon. 
L’offre du petit déjeuner est variée et la qualité correcte.
review.comment_negative:
La piscine est beaucoup moins belle en vrai qu’en photo… De plus elle est froide, alors ce n’est pas un plaisir de s’y baigner. 
La salle de sport a le mérite d’exister, mais en réalité il n’y a que 2 machines qui ne sont pas de première jeunesse, même pas un tapis ou un banc, on a été déçus. 
Nous n’avons pas aimé l’attitude du personnel qui, au moment de partir et alors que nous avions réservé un taxi et avions un avion à prendre, a insisté pour que nous attendions pour le check out, allant même jusqu’à demander expressément à notre chauffeur de ne pas démarrer tant qu’ils n’avaient pas vérifier la chambre… Ça fait vraiment mauvais genre pour un hôtel qui se décrit comme 4 étoiles ! 
Nous avons dans l’ensemble trouvé le rapport qualité prix excessif pour les prestations.

review.rating: ショートステイ向け、空港移動はベルトラ等推奨
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
正味11時間のホーチミン滞在で利用しました。羽田発のNH便だったので、長い入国審査を経てホテルに着いたのは23時でしたが、快く出迎えてもらえました。
ショートステイなので部屋の広さは気にしておらず、必要なものが清潔に揃っていて良かったと思います。
朝食は普通でしたが、アジア料理が多くて個人的には好みでした。
1番の良いところはロケーションで、戦争証跡博物館と統一会堂に歩いて行けました。ドンコイ通りやタンディン教会はgrabで行くことになります。緑が多い区画なので歩いていて気分が良かったです。
review.comment_negative:
連泊できる広さではさすがになかったです。朝食は洋食で安心して済ませたいという人にも不向きかと思います。
注意する必要があるのは空港との移動です。まず、一般にホーチミンのgrabは空港の制限のため変な位置での乗降が必要なので、ターミナルまで歩きますし、激混みの中で落ち合うのも大変です。一方、このホテルはタクシーの提携や自前のドライバーがいないのか、手配するためにクレジットカードの番号と名前だけでなくセキュリティコードまでWordのフォーマットに書いてメールする必要があります。さすがに抵抗があったので、ベルトラの送迎サービスを割高ですが予約しました。

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn ra Thành phố
Suite Gia đình nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: L'hôtel est assez bien mais les chambres sont petites.Il est bien insonorisé et plutôt central.La literie est confortable et les placards assez grands avec un coffre individuel.Le quartier est moyen au niveau restaurants ce qui oblige à prendre  des  taxis  pour aller dîner.Le personnel de réception et de restaurant parle anglais et on peut communiquer.Le restaurant  ne fait  que le petit-déjeuner  et il est correct mais toujours plus adapté  à une clientèle  asiatique  qu'internationale ce qui va s'aggraver vu le peu de touristes occidentaux.
review.comment_negative: Le manque de coordination au niveau du personnel de la reception un vous donne un renseignement un autre qui travaille a côté  vous dit le contraire cinq minutes après.Bonne volonté  mais manque de training.De plus un réceptionniste nous a fait payer  deux petites serviettes de visage qu'il a qualifiées de perdues (lost) uniquement  parce qu'elles étaient  tachees par de la poudre de maquillage mais évidemment  lavables.C'est totalement  inadmissible  et une faute a ce niveau de standing d'hôtel.Conclusion passez votre chemin.

review.rating: Das Hotel hat uns nicht überzeugt.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war freundlich.
review.comment_negative:
Das Frühstück konnte uns nicht überzeugen - qualitativ wie auch geschmacklich.

Das Hotel befindet sich im Kreis 3. Die wichtigsten Sehenswürdigkeiten sind im Kreis 1. Diese erreicht man nach ca. 15 Min. Fußmarsch.

Die Platzverhältnisse im Zimmer waren eng.

Das Wasser im Pool war kalt.

Beim Frühstück war es recht laut (es befand sich eine größere Reisegruppe aus Indien im Hotel).

Es entspricht eher einem drei Sterne Hotel und ist in die Jahre gekommen.

We've got asked several times if we need to get our room clean. In the morning, they served a buffet, changing the meals daily.

review.comment_positive: 房间沙发好坐，窗外面隔应，不会听到外面嘈杂的声音
review.comment_negative:
房间门口外面没隔音，门口外面什么声音动静都能听见。
房间门口应该放张卡挂着就好，选择打扫或者不要干扰，每次一到早上还要听到一间一间房间叫门，还用那么原始的方法问房，很烦！
服务员问要不要洗衣，以为是免费，结果洗出来的衣服费用是非常的昂贵，这里的服务文化，难道就不怕游客没钱给？服务员应该事先要说明要付费的，也怪自己没有注意这点，谢谢！

review.rating: Great value for money in a great location
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
+ Location. Easy to reach with the airport bus or taxi, lots of places within walking distance, plenty of restaurants and street food around
+ Very clean rooms
+ Super comfy beds
+ Very good sound isolation. Although our rooms (we stayed 2 times during our 2-week trip) were facing the road, you could barely hear any noise from there
+ Fast and easy WiFi access
+ Pool on the 9th floor with great views
+ Gym
+ Amenity kit (toothbrush, toothpaste, comb, and a bunch more)
+ Japanese style toilet :)
review.comment_negative:
- Very strict check-in time, exactly at 2 pm and not a hour earlier. 
- Breakfast. Although it was quite diverse, taste-wise it wasn't anything special. 
- The carpet in the hallway on the second floor was filthy, with spots and just dirt.

review.rating: Excellent stay, will definitely book this hotel when I revisit Ho Chi Minh.

review.comment_positive: The location is perfect, most of the tourist attractions are near to the hotel, walking distance 5-15 minutes. The hotel is surrounded with trees and you won't feel hot while walking on the pedestrian road. Besides, there are few café and food stalls can be found near to the hotel. The room is cozy and the soundproof is excellent. Everything in the room is brand new. The breakfast was excellent, I stayed at the hotel for 4 days and I got to tried different dishes every day. The staffs, of course, they were friendly and helpful, If you wish to visit chu chi tunnels and Mekong Delta, you can book the tour from the receptionist, everything will be arranged by them.
review.comment_negative: Just one minor problem, there is no convenient store like 7-11 near to the hotel, you have to walk a distance to get to the convenient store.

review.rating: A really nice stay in central Ho Chi Minh City
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly and attentive and gave us lots of suggestions. We lucked out and we’re upgraded to a suite which was a really nice surprise. We only stayed one night so couldn’t really experience the full offer of the property. I did take a peak at the gym which was pretty meager (1 treadmill, 1 elliptical, some dumbbells). I unfortunately didn’t have time to workout. Breakfast was very nice, a lot on offer and the location was great. There was always someone available to help when needed.
review.comment_negative:
Maybe the pillows were too fluffy?? The gym was too meager in terms of equipment, but I again was not even at the property long enough to exercise.

Honestly, great hotel!

review.rating: Schönes Hotel, zentrale Lage, freundliches Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Schönes, stilvoll eingerichtetes Hotel in sehr guter, zentraler Lage. Das Zimmer war hell und modern gestaltet, bequem und mit einem schönen Bad. Besonders positiv empfand ich die vielen kleinen Annehmlichkeiten, z.B. Pflegeprodukte (auch Zahnputzset, Rasierset, Kamm etc.) im Zimmer oder auch Schreibzeug, welches einem zur Verfügung gestellt wird.
review.comment_negative: Das Frühstück hat leider etwas enttäuscht, die Qualität und Auswahl waren bestenfalls mittelmäßig für ein 4-Sterne Hotel, leider gab es auch fast nichts vegetarisches und nur sehr wenig Getränkeauswahl. Auch hätte ich mir einen größeren Fitnessbereich gewünscht, er war sehr klein und mit nur zwei Geräten auch sehr minimalistisch ausgestattet.

review.rating: Extremely disappointing. I won't be back.
review.room_type: Suite Gia đình nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Staff were unfriendly and unhelpful.
review.comment_negative: At check in staff take photos of your identification on their personal phones which is totally unacceptable, unprofessional and does not protect your privacy. I challenged the manager on this and he was dismissive.  This is highly unethical.  The staff did not help with luggage or open the main doors to welcome when I was struggling with 2 bags, 2 small children and a grandmother. The staff are unfriendly (a smile wouldn't hurt) and unhelpful.  Rather than saying at the end of check in, 'your room doesn't come with breakfast!', how about, 'unfortunately your room rate did not come with breakfast, would you like me to assist to add this to your room for the morning? The cost per person is...'

review.comment_negative:
Just beware of taking grab from the airport.They are already stationed there and got scammed by this particular driver.
He pretended to drop us of at a mobile ship claiming this was the address of the hotel.
He pretended to use google translator and demanded dong to bring us to the hotel.
When we finally reached the hotel,the conceirge was quickly present to prevent an ugly incident.
He finally asked for 5000 dong in front of the conceirge.
As it was a tiring trip I relented.
Conceirge did a good job.

review.comment_positive:
La situation géographique de l'Hotel, dans le district 3 mais très proche de la poste, avec de bons restaurants à proximité.
La chambre est très bien équipée avec des matériaux de qualité (lit très confortable) et la salle de bain également. 
La décoration de l'hôtel est très soignée et la propreté impeccable.
Belle vue depuis la chambre sur la ville.
Le petit déjeuner est de très bonne qualité, très varié.
Le personnel est disponible, agréable avec un bon niveau d'anglais pour les étrangers.

review.rating: Feel sick thinking about the rude and impolite staff. And the dirty bathroom and boiling pool area.
review.room_type: Phòng Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Với Bể Jacuzzi Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Nothing unfortunately, had to check out earlier.
Staff was very rude and impolite.
review.comment_negative:
Staff is very rude and impolite.
Pool area can't be use since it is over 40 degrees (104 degrees Fahrenheit).
The gym in not a gym, has no equipment at all.
The bathroom was very dirty.
Had to check out earlier (but did not get an any compensation at all, they just laughed).
This hotel has for sure bought their reviews from other guests.
A disgrace for Vietnam.
This js not a hotel, is a money making machine.

The hotel asked us on the booking chat function why we checked out earlier. We answered below but did not get an answer. 

"We booked your hotel because of the pool area which looks really nice on the pictures you promote and partly for the gym. We arrived at midnight the 4th of January and looked at the pool area the next day. Unfortunately it was too hot go in there and very humid, it can not be used or promoted as a pool area since it is to hot to be there. We directly asked if we could check out some days earlier but didn't get an answer. We then asked again at the evening and was told we would get an answer the next day. We went and asked the next morning at 07.30 am but didn't get an answer. We came back at lunch time and got told that we couldn't check out earlier for different reasons. We then contacted Booking who contacted you, but you have not replied (bad service).  The standard of the room was ok however the shower drain was clogged which lead to the bathroom floor being flooded so we couldn't shower.  We have told the reception several times why we wanted to check out earlier but they don't seem to listen or care.   We told you days in advance that we wanted to check out earlier but you didn't care about that.   The check out process this morning was very bad. It took a very long time and the guy did not even ask a singe question about or stay."

review.rating: A charming hotel with great staff and cozy rooms with tons of closet space
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: This hotel felt like a standard nice accommodation. The staff were very kind, always willing to help if needed and I felt very safe/at home. The room itself had good air conditioning, a great shower with hot water and great pressure, a cozy bed and most importantly, the room was very soundproof so I was able to sleep with ease. The jacket closet was also very convenient, which allowed me to hang all my clothes like a regular home closet. Overall, for a solo traveller or a couple, this place is more than perfect. It really ticks all the boxes. Lastly, the pool is very relaxing and while the water is a bit cold, it's perfect for those hot Saigon days.
review.comment_negative: What I didn't like was that, upon checkout, I was told that they found makeup on one of the face towels and that I was required to pay for a new one, even though I contested that it could be washed. As well, when I had actively tried out the laundry service, nobody told me that my bill would be £30 for washing. If you are staying at this hotel, definitely be sure to keep the white towels perfectly white and don't bother with the laundry... too expensive.

review.comment_positive: nice hotel
review.comment_negative: came back to my room one day to find a note stating I needed to pay to wash a towel that was used and had apparently had a bit of dirt on it, was confused why I had to pay as they should wash the towels anyway but I paid without fuss, HOWEVER, within minutes of being informed about the towel the housekeeper was straight up with another bill for an alleged “missing” spoon, the spoon had fallen on the floor in the morning and I had forgotten to pick it off the floor before heading out for the day. I picked up the spoon and handed it to the housekeeper just absolutely confused why they were being so money grabbing, it was so off putting. my stay after this incident was a weird vibe to say the least. On checkout I was rushing to make a bus and reception wouldn’t leave me leave the hotel until they checked the room, which fair enough, I waited 20 minutes at this point I had to leave as my taxi to the bus was outside. the housekeepers we’re sending pictures of things in the room to reception, which I was confused about too. I informed them that I had to leave to make my bus and continued to my taxi, however the bell boy tried to stop me from leaving by speaking in Thai to the driver. I was a bit distraught after this and had to beg the driver to take me to my bus as I was going to miss it. it was the strangest check out experience of my life and because of this I would not recommend staying here. it’s a lovely hotel but the staff unfortunately ruined my stay.

review.rating: Amazing stay, would definitely recommend and would definitely rebook here if I came back
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Great location! It is in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City but off of the main roads so it’s easy to get to and not super congested. 
It’s also a 5 min walk from Turtle Lake! 
The rooms are clean, large and comfortable. 
The bathrooms are also updated and super clean with Japanese bidets. 
The service and hotel workers are super friendly, attentive and so helpful.
review.comment_negative: The pool closes a little bit early at 6pm, but that’s the only thing that I would say needs to change.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố

review.rating: Ein Hotel mit guter Lage für shopping und sightseeing.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Das Frühstück ist reichhaltig, die Speisen sind heiß, es gibt vietnamesisches und europäische Speisen. Spezielle Kaffees werden frisch zubereitet, Gute Saftauswahl, Brotauswahl, Frisch zubereitete Eier und Suppe. Kleiner Pool mit 5 Liegen, Barbereich im Poolbereich. Eigenes Restaurant im Hotel, jeder Zeit warmes Essen möglich. Die Zimmer sind mit Massivholzmöbeln eingerichtet, zweckmäßig und klein. Die Lage ist sehr gut, nettes Viertel mit Parkanlage,  Postgebäude mit Tourist-Info und Notre Dame gleich in Gehminuten. Von hier kann man eine Bustour durch die Stadt machen. In der Umgebung finden sich Supermarkt, Geschäfte, Restaurants und Kaffees.
review.comment_negative: Das einzige Hotel gebucht über booking com, was ungefragt meine Kreditkarte belastet hat vor Ankunft. Das sei Politik des Hauses. Late check out, wegen Abendflug kostet 50% Aufpreis des Tagesatzes.

review.rating: Sauberes Hotel in zentraler Lage mit guter Ausstattung
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Top gelegenes Hotel, von dem man alle Sehenswürdigkeiten gut zu Fuß erreichen kann. Das Zimmer war sauber und gegen den Straßenlärm sehr gut isoliert. Das Personal ist freundlich und sehr hilfsbereit. Würde wiederkommen.
review.comment_negative: Beim Frühstück gibt’s wenig Auswahl für Vegetarier, aber das ist in Vietnam leider üblich.

review.rating: If you stay there, be careful with “made up” extra costs
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: I was very happy with this hotel until it was time to check out…
review.comment_negative:
On check out they wanted to charge me 20 dólares for 2 dirty towels that, according to them, were “impossible to clean”. I was very surprised - we hadn't left any dirty towels like that.  So I asked to see those - I had just left the room less than 5 minutes before and want to check those so called “dirty towels”. 

They didn’t not show the towels to me and kept insisting that I pay for them. I had to go to the airport, didn’t have time to discuss anymore, so I ended up paying for one, but it got me very upset. 

I wouldn’t stay in this hotel, some dodgy is going on there to get extra money from their guests.

review.comment_positive: This is a lovely property out of many at HCMNC , located right at the start of Pasteur street very close to the main area of Independance palace , Notre Dame cathedral , also located near to Ben Tanh market as well …. After that I must say the room was pretty good though a bit small but neat clear on 12th floor facing the high rises lovely view … air conditioning to washroom all okay … Good quality amenities in the room . Breakfast was large enough spread. I must mention the pool is good clean as well with the bar attached is nice as well  . Hospitality is good and staffs are helpful . Overall good stay.
review.comment_negative: The room could have been a bit larger , there should have been a luggage keeper stand like one has to sit on floor for luggage arrange . And secondly there could have been more water bottles one small bottle for one adult each are just not sufficient for a day , one has to buy water from outside .

review.comment_negative:
Il semble compliqué de laisser un stock de serviettes à la piscine… à chaque fois que nous avons souhaité utiliser la piscine il a fallut demander des serviettes. 
Lors du séjour, l’hôtel offre une collation l’après midi (thé et pâtisseries). très sympathique sur le principe. Dans les faits nous avons eu un thé Lipton… un mini croissant au jambon et une pana cota “local” et impossible d’avoir un verre d’eau même si nous souhaitons le payer car dans un bar on ne sert pas d’eau… 
Difficile également de programmer un taxis pour le lendemain.

The staff were friendly and helpful. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The TV had Netflix which is convenient if you have an account.

The hotel was in a really good location for sightseeing and super convenient for Grab pick ups if using them. The pool was refreshing and there was always space to sit around the pool on a lounger or at a table.

The room was so small that I couldn’t open my suitcase without putting it on the bed. I didn’t like that the shower was open with just a 3/4 length shower curtain - the bathroom floor got really wet.

The air con turned off in the middle of the night and it was uncomfortable but I find this happens in most hotels.

review.comment_positive:
The doormen were very polite and friendly everyday. 
Location is excellent as everything is walking distance.
review.comment_negative:
○ There was no barman by the pool area every night, we had to call reception downstairs multiple times to assist us with drinks and food. 

○ No cocktails or cider options on the menu. 

○ The Do not disturb/ cleaning button did not work at the door. 

○ The mattress and bedding was itchy like there were bedbugs. Pimples around ankles indicate bed bugs. 

○ The pool area is not the best, very small space not alot of seating options, no music. 

○ I used the bathroom towels after washing my hair and naturally there were some hair dye stains on the towel, this was a problem for the hotel and asked me to pay the laundry fee for the towels. I have been to multiple hotels in different locations and have not experienced this. It's unusual and humiliating. The dry cleaning of towels and linen should be on the hotel as I am paying to use these things in the hotel room.

○ Breakfast options were not good.

review.comment_positive:
Chambres spacieuses, très bien équipées, silencieuses alors que nous donnions sur l avenue. Arrangement pour que nous soyons tous au même étage. Arrivée et départ vite enregistrés.  Service bagagerie au top. Petit déjeuner très copieux, varié.
Piscine agréable et bienvenue quand il fait très chaud.
 Personnel professionnel, attentif, courtois, souriant et disponible. A su repondre à nos attentes et même plus avec par exemple proposition d une douche en fin de journée avant notre départ tardif alors que chambre rendue le matin, piscine également accessible. 
Merci à toutes vos équipes en particulier Thung, Huy et Nghia toujours serviables et attentionnés. Nous vous recommanderons sans problème.

Le coin piscine avec les transat à est ridicule, il y a 5 transats disponible quand on sait que l’hôtel a 12 étages et elle ferme à 18h alors que nous sommes touristes et que nous visitons la journée et avec 40 degrés il est fort appréciable de profiter de la piscine en fin de journée.
De plus le service navette n’existe pas non plus, nous avons du réserver par nous même à l’arrivée, refus de nous mettre à dispo un taxi avec pancarte ou encore mettre à dispo la navette. Bref, service pas à la hauteur

Deluxe Room is spacious and clean, there are plenty of channels, available apps on the TV. We really liked the choice of the breakfast and the good quality of espresso. Bon petit déjeuner. La compagnie de taxis conseillée Vinasun que ce soit pour le trajet aéroport/hôtel ou pour se déplacer est en effet sérieuse et à prix doux (compteur).

review.comment_positive: The staff were very pleasant and accommodating (unless you ask to fill your own water bottle….. that’s a no no!).  The rooms are lovely and comfortable, with lots of bath products included. The pool area is nice but more than 6 people and it’s a bit crowded & only 5 beds provided. The gym area (1 running machine, 1 cross trainer and limited weights) was never busy. The location is excellent, not too busy and in easy walking distance to everything you will want to see or need. review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Good location
review.comment_negative:
The hotel gave us a room which was smaller than described and on a low floor facing a cafe balcony a few feet away even though the description of the room said "city view" so we could not even open the curtains. Eventually they moved us to another room on the same floor after two days,  after we complained multiple times. It was clear that the hotel staff knew that the room we had was a worse room because every staff member we mentioned it to knew immediately what we were talking about when we mentioned the room number. 

The staff were pretty unfriendly and even tried repeatedly to get us to delay getting into our taxi as we were rushing to leave in the morning to get to the airport (even though we told them we were in a rush to catch our flight) so they could check our room to look for things to charge us for. They ran out as we were getting in the taxi to tell us we owed them 35k vnd for a bottle of water we took from the fridge two days ago which they could have checked the day before when making up the room.

review.comment_negative:
Staying here several times due to its location and cleanliness, but this time we are extremely disappointed. Staff being dishonest, lack of professionalism, no coordination between staff. Room was not available at check-in time 14:00 and we had to wait for 2 hours until 16:00 to get to our room (As they said, previous guests already checked out at 12:00, and they need time to 14:15 to clean the room but when we came back at 14:30, room was not available until 16:00. So, they need 4 hours to clean the room!!!)
Misconstruction in the bathroom, water flooded on the floor after taking a bathtub. Our room is very noisy in the evening due to Karaoke next door.
The closet has no compartments, only a clothes rail, which is equipped with 5 hangers, 3 of them with bathrobes. Also, there is little storage for clothes and no luggage rack.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The room was great. Clean and comfortable. The pool area was excellent. It is covered but open to the outside warmth. Fabulous breakfast every day with very good service. The Bellman Mr Phouc Nghia was very helpful and polite. I think they should make him concierge which the hotel doesn’t have.
review.comment_negative: The hotel needs a concierge. We arrived off a 6.30am flight, exhausted, from Paris. Although the two ladies on the desk were doing their best, and were polite, it was clear that an early check-in was beyond their authority. We did eventually get into a room at 1.00pm - after waiting 5 or 6 hours. I realise the hotel was quite full but usually a hotel is able to do something to release a room a bit earlier. The restaurant is a bit odd. The breakfast is served on the ground floor. Dinner is served in your room or in the reception area. There is an upstairs dining room next to the pool but I don’t think it was used. The biggest issue is no concierge to arrange tours, assist with advice on where things were and where to eat etc. We were supplied with 2 city maps which proved to be less than useful! One had the hotel shown in the wrong side of the road, and the other had the one way traffic going the wrong way! We got lost a lot! So my recommendation would be to promote Mr phouc to concierge with appropriate recompense and things could improve dramatically!

We looked at several unsuitable rooms, discussed our options, and finally got them to offer us afternoon teas (which were pathetic,  btw) as compensation. Apologies were not forthcoming from the staff.

The breakfast was stunning, a variety of options, local and foreign. The Pho is highly recommend, lovely selection of tropical fruits.

The staff were very helpful also offering a luggage storage service, run professionally with reception tags and pictures taken of your luggage.

5. Comfy double bed [Room Type Deluxe Double]
6. High Security for Lift and Room Access via Door Key
review.comment_negative:
1. Only 1 hanger in the bathroom for clothes, to be added more
2. No USB Charger socket but generic electrical socket
3. The air-con responds to temperature adjustment slowly
4. Small bathroom area for bathing
5. Water is easily spilled over to other area in the bathroom due to no separator between bathing zone and washing basin or toilet.
